Rooms.Name: Northwest Corner of the Inner Wall
Northeast Corner of the Inner Wall
Southwestern Corner of the Inner Wall
Southeastern Corner of the Inner Wall

Objects.Name: portal
Objects.Description: A shimmering portal leading to Midgaard has been placed here.

Objects.Name: beer bottle imported beer
Objects.Description: A bottle of imported beer has been left here.

Objects.Name: stout bottle malt liquor ale
Objects.Description: A dark bottle of stout malt liquor has been left here.

Objects.Name: glass firebreather
Objects.Description: A glass of firebreather was left here.

Objects.Name: bottle brew special local
Objects.Description: A dark bottle of some special brew was left here.

Objects.Name: green robe
Objects.Description: A green robe of the magi lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This beautiful flowing robe is the prized possesion of the magi.  It isstrange to find it here.

Objects.Name: red robe
Objects.Description: A beautiful red magi robe
Objects.ExtraDescription: The robe of the order of the red magi.  Very well made.

Objects.Name: blue robe
Objects.Description: A blue robe sits here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The robe of the order of the blue magi.  Very well made.

Objects.Name: round fishing hat
Objects.Description: A round fishing hat has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Round, rumpled, and covered in lures, this hat must have been someone'sfavorite.

Objects.Name: waybread bread
Objects.Description: Some waybread has been put here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The waybread is the traditional feed of elves when traveling, they call itlembas.  It is said to refresh the weary traveler greatly.

Objects.Name: dried rations
Objects.Description: Some dried rations has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These rations are bland and serve no other purpose than to keep you alive.

Objects.Name: apple
Objects.Description: A nice looking delicious red apple has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The apple looks fresh, except for one small worm hole in, nothing wrong witha little protien in your diet.

Objects.Name: crescent
Objects.Description: A tasty looking crescent has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The crescent looks warm and flaky, just how you like it...

Objects.Name: bourbon shot whisky
Objects.Description: A shot of bourbon is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This is the kind of liquor that makes successful peopl into sloppy drunks.You sure you're man or woman enough to drink this stuff?

Objects.Name: pretzel
Objects.Description: A pretzel has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Heavily salted, you better buy a drink if you're gonna eat this thing.

Objects.Name: safe banks
Objects.Description: A huge safe sits behind the counter, filled with gold coins.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The door is propped open, the glint of gold coins sparkles from the lanternoverhead.  Looks like enough gold is contained within to retire and live a fulllife.  Too bad no one ever steals from this bank.

Objects.Name: bench
Objects.Description: A bench of black polished granite looks mighty uncomfortable.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The bench is carved out of a single block of black granite and has beenpolished to a smooth shine.

Objects.Name: rack armor
Objects.Description: A rack of armor rests here against one wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Chain mail shirts, leggings, helms, sleeves, everything an adventurer couldever need.

Objects.Name: rack weapons
Objects.Description: A rack of weapons leans against the wall.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Swords, clubs, implements of masss destruction for the taking, at the rightprice of course

Objects.Name: yellow robe
Objects.Description: A yellow robe of the Magi was left here, how strange.
Objects.ExtraDescription: An expertly woven silken cloth of very high quality, most magi would diebefore giving one of these up.

Objects.Name: dagger
Objects.Description: A dagger with a long thin blade is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A simple dagger used by thieves and hoodlums to relieve the unwary of theirmoney.

Objects.Name: sword small
Objects.Description: A small sword lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The basic sword of the Sanctus army.  Nothing spectacular about it.

Objects.Name: gray robe
Objects.Description: An exquisite gray robe is rumpled in a corner.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This simple robe is the type used by Magi of the gray order.

Objects.Name: club wooden
Objects.Description: A simple looking wooden club is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Your basic club, nothing very remarkeable about it.

Objects.Name: mace
Objects.Description: A mace is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This mace is made of a heavy polished metal with small spikes on the end.Look deadly

Objects.Name: flail large
Objects.Description: A large flail is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A strange weapon, you wonder if you even know how to use it.

Objects.Name: purple robe
Objects.Description: A magnificent purple robe was deserted here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Another impressive robe of the Magi.  This robe looks to be in very goodshape.

Objects.Name: brass knuckles
Objects.Description: Some brass knuckles are here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These, heavy, wicked looking knuckles could do some serious damage if wornon the hands.

Objects.Name: cigarette
Objects.Description: An un-smoked cigarette has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A perfectly good cigarette, home-made by the looks of it, but wrapped veryneatly.

Objects.Name: black robe
Objects.Description: A black robe of the Magi hangs on a small coatrack.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This robe is very hard to focus on.  When you stare at it your eyes seem toslide right off the black velvety material.

Objects.Name: torch
Objects.Description: A large torch.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Your basic torch, nothing very remarkeable about it.

Objects.Name: lantern brass
Objects.Description: A brass lantern is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Your basic lantern, nothing very remarkeable about it.  Just a fuel tank,glass covering and a wick.

Objects.Name: bag
Objects.Description: A small bag is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A simple bag to help you carry all of your belongings.

Objects.Name: backpack
Objects.Description: A backpack is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A hefty backpack that can carry more than a bag.

Objects.Name: dog collar
Objects.Description: A dog collar was left here, what happened to the poor dog?
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks mangled and chewed, the dog probably pulled it off.

Objects.Name: catnip
Objects.Description: A pile of catnip is here waiting for a cat to enjoy it.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This stuff drives cats bonkers.

Objects.Name: broom
Objects.Description: A broom is lying on the floor.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Looks like the streetsweep must be taking a break, he left his broom lyinghere.

Objects.Name: whisky dirty glass whisky
Objects.Description: A filthy glass of whiskey was left here, waiting to be emptied.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You think that's whisky in there.  The glass is so filthy you can't be sure.

Objects.Name: wine white glass wine
Objects.Description: A glass of white wine is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A very fancy and tall glass holding some white wine.  The drink of themiddle class.

Objects.Name: champagne speciality local
Objects.Description: A champagn glass sits on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A tall glass with a long skinny stem.  The type of glass that rich folk useto drink bubbly.

Objects.Name: cloth jacket
Objects.Description: A jacket is lying on the floor
Objects.ExtraDescription: A rugged looking cloth jacket.

Objects.Name: leather gloves
Objects.Description: A pair of leather gloves lie here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Rugged looking brown leather gloves.

Objects.Name: shield wooden
Objects.Description: A small wooden shield is lying on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's small, it's wooden.

Objects.Name: pants pair black leather
Objects.ShortDescription: a pair of black leather pants
Objects.Description: A pair of black leather pants lie on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These pants are in very good condition.  They would provide minimalprotection during a fight.

Objects.Name: helm leather
Objects.Description: A leather helm is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: jacket scale
Objects.Description: A scale mail jacket is lying on the ground.

Objects.Name: blood pool
Objects.Description: A pool of blood from a recent kill has collected here.

Objects.Name: splugen bottle beer
Objects.Description: Some exotic beer from far away.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This beer looks and tastes like formaldehyde.

Objects.Name: blue velvet pants
Objects.Description: A pair of blue pants made from a fine fabric.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These gaudy velvet pants are meant for a royal court, not adventuring.Most respectable adventurers wouldn't even be caught dead in these things.

Objects.Name: dustpan dust pan
Objects.Description: A dustpan has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The streetsweeper uses this to clean up the city.

Objects.Name: white shirt
Objects.Description: A fine white shirt is crumpled into a ball.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This fine silken shirt could fetch a nice price if it wasn't in such poorshape.  Frills of lace line the collar and cuffs.  The kind of shirt one wouldwear to a court or very fancy social gathering.

Objects.Name: red vest
Objects.Description: A red vest was left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The vest is far more extravagant than anything you have ever worn before.Fancy designs run up and down it's length.  This would look very nice over afancy shirt.

Objects.Name: cane
Objects.Description: An old worn cane lies here in the dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks to be carved from some type of hard wood.  Maybe oak or maple.Only traces of varnish can be seen on the wood that has been worn smooth fromtime and use.

Objects.Name: touppe brown
Objects.Description: A brown mass of hair almost looks like a small animal, it must be someon's touppe.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks more like a rat than anything else.  Some balding people wear thesethings to try and look younger.  The can sometimes fetch a good price at thelocal pawn if they are of high enough quality.  This one unfortunately, isn't.

Objects.Name: sewing machine
Objects.Description: A sewing machine is covered in clothes.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It is made of both metal and wood, a large footpedal can be pumped to makethe strange contraption lower and raise a needle through the cloth.  Veryingenious contraption.  It is the only one in the city and because of it Carlahas a monopoly on clothing.

Objects.Name: feather duster
Objects.Description: A feather duster lies in the dirt.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Made from the feathers of a very large bird this duster is extremely cleanconsidering the purpose it is supposed to serve.  Then again maybe it is justused to make the person holding it look busy.

Objects.Name: purse
Objects.Description: Someone's purse has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The initials NJW are inscribed in gold lettering.  Very fancy.  Whoever hadthis must have been well off.  The drawstring used to hold it to a belt hasbeen cleanly cut.  Must be someone had their purse snatched.

Objects.Name: gunney's hat
Objects.Description: This is Gunney's hat, better not be caught wearing it.

Objects.Name: coveralls
Objects.Description: A set of coveralls lies here.

Objects.Name: list directions sanctus
Objects.Description: A list of directions to important areas within Sanctus lies here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: @nrecall Room - teleport SanctusNewbie Zones - teleport NewbieFood - 1d, 3s, 1e, 1n1d, 3s, 1w, 1nWater - 1d, 3n, 2e, 1sDonation Room - 1d, 1n, 1wCleric Guild - 1d, 7s, 3w, 2uWarrior Guild - 1d, 7n, 5w, 1n, 1uMage Guild - 1d, 7s, 2e, 2uThief Guild - 1d, 7n, 4e, 1n, 1uPost Office - 1d, 3n, 1w, 1sBank - 1d, 3n, 1e, 1s

Objects.Name: kitchen timer
Objects.Description: A kitchen timer has been abandoned here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The face of the timer has the number one to ten on it with two hands.

Objects.Name: sacrificial entrails
Objects.Description: The entrails of a sacrificial animal.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The animal is impossible to identify.  Just a collection of intestines, astomach, maybe a liver.  Hard to tell with the it dripping in blood.

Objects.Name: row boat
Objects.Description: A row boat has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A sturdy row boat with three seats and paddles bolted in the middle.

Objects.Name: floatation device
Objects.Description: A floatation device has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: You would have to be crazy to attemp to cross large bodies of water with thething.

Objects.Name: beggin strips treats bacon
Objects.Description: A poor dog lost their treats here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Even though they really don't look like bacon, they smell strangely similiarto it.  The front of the bag reads 'Dogs don't know its not bacon.  '

Objects.Name: water cup water
Objects.Description: A cup has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Just a plain old cup of water.  Nothing special about it.

Objects.Name: cloth pants
Objects.Description: A pair of cloth pants is rumpled up into a ball.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The pants are filthy, but wearable.

Objects.Name: cloth cap
Objects.Description: A cloth cap rests on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The kind of cap a street urchin might wear.

Objects.Name: cloth shirt
Objects.Description: A cloth shirt lays on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The shirt looks pretty rugged.  The plain dirty white cloth would providesome protection.

Objects.Name: cloth shoes
Objects.Description: A pair of cloth shoes are here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: These shoes are more like moccassins than anything else.  A strip of leatheron their soles should make them last a long time and protect your feet verywell.

Objects.Name: gloves cloth
Objects.Description: A pair of cloth gloves have been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: They are a ditry white color, with the fingers cut off, these gloves lookuseful.

Objects.Name: short staff gilded oak
Objects.ShortDescription: a short gilded staff of oak
Objects.Description: A short staff of oak gilded in silver looks well made.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The staff is too short for use by the average human.  It is well made from anextremely straight and unspoiled oak.  Silver gilding has been added in a spiralgiving the staff extra strength and support.

Objects.Name: rubber chicken
Objects.Description: A yellow rubber chicken has been chewed half to death.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This dog toy barely even resembles its namesake.  The long yellow body iselongated and several holes have been chewed into it.  Its feet and crown are astrange orange color.  I small plug is stuck where its butt should be and makesa squeaking noise when you squeeze it.

Objects.Name: ten sided dice die
Objects.Description: A ten sided die is waiting to be rolled
Objects.ExtraDescription: The die has been carefully carved out of bone with black spots painted oneach of its 10 sides accordingly.  @RROLL DIE@n

Objects.Name: hairball
Objects.Description: A hairball was left here from what must have been a very large cat.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The hairball is about the size of a childs fist and has a fetid odor of deadmice.

Objects.Name: rope bell toll
Objects.Description: A long rope hangs down through the middle of the room.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The rope is suspended in the middle of the room and rises into the darknessof the ceiling above. It looks like it might be attached to a bell in the towerabove.

Objects.Name: cancer stick
Objects.Description: A cancer stick was left here by someone gone cold turkey.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Commonly known as a cigarette (or fag if you practice the Queen's English)this addictive, cancer causing carcinogen was once thought to be cool.

Objects.Name: water canteen water
Objects.Description: A canteen has been set on the ground here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This canteen is pretty old and has acquired a strange smell.

Objects.Name: chunk meat
Objects.Description: An hunk of meat lies here covered in dirt.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The meat is some form of venison.  Hard to tell since it is rather filthy.

Objects.Name: bar platinum
Objects.Description: A bar of platinum must have been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The platinum bar is formed perfectly into a rectangular block.  Its surfaceis smooth and polished.

Objects.Name: bar mithril
Objects.Description: A bar of mithril must have been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The mithril bar is formed perfectly into a rectangular block.  Its surfaceis smooth and polished.

Objects.Name: bar gold
Objects.Description: A bar of gold must have been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The gold bar is formed perfectly into a rectangular block.  Its surface issmooth and polished.

Objects.Name: bar silver
Objects.Description: A bar of silver must have been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The silver bar is formed perfectly into a rectangular block.  Its surface issmooth and polished.

Objects.Name: calendar
Objects.Description: A calendar of beautiful woman is pinned on the wall.

Objects.Name: scroll poem irish
Objects.Description: A scroll is rolled up here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: May there always be work for your hands to do;   May your purse always hold a coin or two;   May the sun always shine on your windowpane;   May a rainbow be certain to follow each rain;   May the hand of a friend always be near you;   ...

Objects.Name: mushrooms
Objects.Description: A clump of mushrooms is growing here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The mushrooms appear not to be poisonous and are relatively clean. They lookedible.

Objects.Name: iron bound wooden chest
Objects.Description: A large wooden chest with bands of iron circling it is closed with its lock hanging open.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The chest is in excellent condition.  Made from a fine grain of wood it isstained and polished to a shine.  Bands of iron to wrap around the chest.  But,the lock hangs open.

Objects.Name: staff gnarled
Objects.Description: A gnarled wooden staff beacons you.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The staff appears to have been twisted into a strange spiral up along itssurface.  The top has three claws meant to hold something.  It is conspicuoslyempty.

Objects.Name: scroll deep green remove curse
Objects.Description: A deep green scroll has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A scroll that will remove a curse from an object or person.

Objects.Name: orb topping
Objects.ShortDescription: an orb meant to top a staff
Objects.Description: An orb meant to top a staff must have fallen out here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The orb is about the size of a small fist.  It appears to have been meant tobe placed on the end of a staff.

Objects.Name: broken staff
Objects.Description: A broken and useless staff has been discarded here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It appears to have once been a very nice staff that someone ruined by puttingit together wrong.  Someone must have not been able to "join" it properly.

Objects.Name: blood trickle stream thin liquid red blood
Objects.ShortDescription: a thin stream of red liquid
Objects.Description: A small trickle of red liquid flows from the shop to the north to a drain to the south.
Objects.ExtraKeyword: blood trickle stream thin liquid red blood
Objects.ExtraDescription: The liquid has a heavy metallic scent to it and is mixed with dirt and a fewother questionable liquids.

Objects.Name: closet
Objects.Description: A closet is built into the south wall of the room.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The closet door is made of faded wood and it has rusty hinges.

Objects.Name: rotten mistletoe
Objects.Description: This mistletoe reeks of mold and decay.

Objects.Name: mistletoe plant
Objects.Description: A soft woody plant with green leaves and white berries is hanging over your head.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The tradition of kissing under the mistletoe originated from the Druids whoconsidered the mistletoe sacred.  They believed that it held magical virtue andwas a remedy for evil.  The priests would cut pieces of the oak tree on whichthe mistletoe grew and offer them along with two white bulls as a sacrifice topagan gods.  Twigs with berries were hung above doors to indicate that pastgrievance and hatreds were forgiven and it was used in amulets, bracelets andrings to ward off evil and protect against witchcraft and poisoning.  Mistletoesymbolizes peace and love.

Objects.Name: kickme sign
Objects.Description: A sign with "kick me" written in bold black letters is laying on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The sign seems to suggest that someone should kick whoever is wearing it.  Apiece of tape is affixed to the top of the small piece of paper and looksperfect to place on someone's back.

Objects.Name: pair lungs scuba underwater
Objects.Description: A pair of strange looking lungs have been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This contraption seems to be made from a set of lungs pulled out of some verylarge fish.  A hose and mouthpiece has been attached so it can be hung aroundthe neck.
